title: The Seventh Floor (Part 1)
body:
The Seventh Floor (Part 1)

//Fourth Floor. Evan. 5M. 4Sec.//

Once Evan killed all the S rank and the Rank One monster of the fourth floor, the fourth floor truly became a perfect picnic spot.

Since Evan had to recover his mana before going to the fifth floor, he decided to stay on the fourth floor for a few hours and relax for a bit. He released all of his shadow undeads from his shadow storage and in just a few seconds, the entire fourth floor which was eerily quiet became a party floor.

Evan was floating like a log in the lake, basking in the warm sunlight. Adam, Illusia, Amara, Olivia and a few other of his shadow undeads were grilling meat on the beach of the small island and Aqua and a few other water type monsters turned a large part of the lake into an amusement park.

Water slides that were a few kilometres high filled the lake and his shadow undeads were playing on them.
